name: My Little Monster (Cats With Knives)
description:
CALLING ALL SUPERVILLAINS! Do you want to rule the world? Are you afraid of being alone? My Little Monster is here to bring you the fuzzy friend you didn't know you needed! 

It's up to you to train your monster to be the best it can be. Will it be strong? Smart? Fast? Raise its stats with minigames and see! Your love and care will guide it to greatness... or a great mess. There are five endings to find based on YOUR monster's talents. 

You only have 14 days, so plan accordingly! Your monster is counting on you!

Made in only two weeks after a monster ate our original game, we hope you'll enjoy MY LITTLE MONSTER!
